channel.title: CVE Feed for radgeek -- FeedWordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for radgeek -- FeedWordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-0839|2024-03-13T15:26:36.360Z -- radgeek -- feedwordpress
item.description: The FeedWordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 2022.0222 due to missing validation on the user controlled 'guid' key. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view draft posts that may contain sensitive information.
